Summary: very fast moving, dull dark blood red rectangle
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Niagara Falls
There was one other sighting in Niagara Falls on or around May 16th 2012
divs: sighting detailswent out to smoke a cig at 1:30 in the morning, looked up and saw an extremely fast moving dark\shadowy red rectangular object moving from west to east, this thing was huge, depending on the altitude which i cannot precisely estimate, although i believe it was pretty high up, i would guess it's size at a football field or greater, no sound, no lights
